name: Noble Writ with Wax Seal
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, In-world document: Noble Writ with Wax Seal, creased parchment, water damage, ink bleed, readable serif fonts; clear headings; no gibberish, microtext / cipher hints, high-res scan, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Text must be legible and non-gibberish. Favor simple, readable serif fonts, larger kerning, and clear headings. If uncertain, use short Latin-like placeholder words with proper spacing, or leave blank lines for later typesetting., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Noble Writ with Wax Seal as an in-world paper prop.
revised_prompt: Create a high-resolution, painterly-style image in a palette of teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. This image should depict a scene from an undersea, medieval fantasy world akin to the style of Dungeons and Dragons. Implement features in the scene such as bioluminescent accents and subsurface caustics, indicative of an aquatic setting. In this setting, include an aged noble writ sealed with wax, on creased and water-damaged parchment displaying ink bleed. The writ should be legible, adorned with clear headings, using simple, readable serif fonts, and larger kerning. The document can include hints of microtext or ciphers but must avoid random letter strings. Everything, including the gear, should represent a cultural coherence devoid of any modern tech or signage. The composition of the image should be presented in the requested aspect/resolution, avoiding artifacts.
